title: I get a "miss call now" notification without any SIM or any call app Installed
content:
To reproduce step follows
1. Go to phone recent calls
2. Tap on favourites or contacts or exit
3. You will see the "miss call now " on the top right corner notification

If u try to open it there is no caller in it 
And it takes back to the empty recent calls.

The most interesting of this bug that it's a just been factory reset
So there is no calls no call apps like WhatsApp and there is no sim card 

I recon this is the device or please anyone can help I appreciate it.
Please see attached photo
